column1: Uchi////We loved our meal so much
column2: we helped newcomers at the sushi bar plan their meal.  Some of the other items you must try are the walu walu (one of the best pieces of fish I have ever eaten)
column3: ham and eggs roll (pork belly in sushi form)
column4: and peanut butter semifreddo.  Though to be honest
column5: I have never been disappointed with anything I've eaten here.  You can also try their happy hour from 5:00 - 6:30 pm that happens every day of the week.  It's a great deal but becomes packed so get there early.
